identity.mission: Create a high-trust, vibrant community funding platform that breaks the generic 'SaaS Blue' mold. Mix Swiss precision with organic warmth.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Swiss Grid + Organic Textures
Emotion First: Trust (Medical) vs. Joy (Party) vs. Clarity (Society)
Content is King: Every collection tells a story
Negative Space: Luxurious padding (p-8 to p-12)
Contrast: High contrast text for accessibility and impact

headings.usage: All H1-H3 headings. Use font-weight 800 for Hero titles.

mono.usage: Transaction IDs, code snippets, financial data.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bricolage+Grotesque:opsz,wght@12..96,200..800&family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono&display=swap');

primary.description: Vibrant Orange for high-urgency actions (Donate, Pay).

secondary.description: International Klein Blue for trust, headers, and secondary actions.

rules: Primary Orange (#FF5F00) is ONLY for the main 'Donate' or 'Create' call to action.
Use International Klein Blue (#002FA7) for brand presence and trust markers.
Backgrounds should be mostly White (#FFFFFF) or very subtle Gray (#F5F5F7). Avoid heavy colored backgrounds.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF5F00] hover:bg-[#E05400] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: bg-[#002FA7] hover:bg-[#002585] text-white rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all
buttons.outline: border-2 border-[#002FA7] text-[#002FA7] hover:bg-[#002FA7] hover:text-white rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-[#52525B] hover:text-[#0A0A0A] hover:bg-[#F5F5F7] rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.style: bg-white border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 group

inputs.style: bg-[#F5F5F7] border-transparent focus:border-[#002FA7] focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#002FA7]/20 rounded-xl h-12 px-4 transition-all

badges.style: rounded-full px-3 py-1 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider

hero_images.alt: Diverse group of friends taking a selfie at a rooftop party
Women standing around a tree, community vibe

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Update 'index.css' to import Bricolage Grotesque and Inter fonts.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the responsive container and navigation.
4. Build the 'CollectionCard' component using the 'Cards' style defined above.
5. Implement the 'Create Collection' form using Shadcn Form components but styled with the 'Inputs' style.
6. Use the 'Bento' grid for the Landing Page features section.
8. Use the defined color palette variables in 'tailwind.config.js' or directly in classes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ğŸ¤–ğŸ§ ğŸ’­ğŸ’¡ğŸ”®ğŸ¯ğŸ“šğŸ­ğŸ¬ğŸªğŸ‰ğŸŠğŸğŸ€ğŸ‚ğŸ°ğŸˆğŸ¨ğŸ°ğŸ’°ğŸ’µğŸ’³ğŸ¦ğŸ’ğŸª™ğŸ’¸ğŸ¤‘ğŸ“ŠğŸ“ˆğŸ“‰ğŸ’¹ğŸ”¢ğŸ†ğŸ¥‡ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use 'sonner' for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
